title: 98/394/EC: Commission Decision of 29 May 1998 amending Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of milk and milk products for human consumption (notified under document number C(1998) 1412) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 May 1998 amending Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of milk and milk products for human consumption (notified under document number C(1998) 1412) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/394/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/252/EC is supplemented by the Annex to this Decision covering South Africa.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
